body:
inb4 I get hate. Well in case you didn't know I play WoW, and I wanted to make a thread about to see if anyone plays it and discuss news, accounts, and maybe even play together! So if you play WoW or other Bizzard games just say you do with your Battle Tag.

This thread would also be about other games Bizzard have made like Starcraft, hearthstone, HoS, etc..
body_tagged:

replies.body:
Oh yes, WoW. Just a few fun facts...
-A few years ago I played WoW until I was banned for a week.
 -I forgot my Battle Tag and my highest level was I think a 75 Dark Knight (although you start at level 55 so it's pretty easy) 
-My brother (level 100) is an active troll in the WoW forums community. :}

replies.body: Never played a blizzard game but being a fan of the yogscast, you tend to hear a lot about them. Should I get into WoW and if so can someone give a rundown of what to expect?
replies.body_tagged: Never played a blizzard game but being a fan of the yogscast, you tend to hear a lot about them. Should I get into WoW and if so can someone give a rundown of what to expect?

replies.body: club penguin is D best tho
replies.body_tagged: club penguin is D best tho

replies.body: Expect getting to 100 pretty fast since you get the LvL 90 boost. You might want to look up some guides for classes you would like to play to see the basic rundown. For new players it should be fun :D. Any farther questions just ask.
